column5: Went to my sisters for the weekend to spend time with the family and do some fishing. caught 5 pike and what i think was a silver bass and a pickerel.   silver bass?     spent time with my nieces and nephew's this is 4 of them  we had a blast got to take them out fishing and 2 of them caught there first fish and were the ever excited the one on the end in shorts  caught his first pike and the girl on the other end caught her first fish ever a nice pickerel   its always fun being part of it this guy did not catch  any but still holding  on to dad's fish made him happy
Nice going PG ! The kids always make the day fun and memorable Tite lines  Paul
Looks like a great weekend     Gotta love when the nieces and nephews catch a fish and learn a thing or two about it.  Great fun and great pics Guy!!!
Good stuff Guy.  And yes, Silver Bass.
